title: Golden Globe Reactions: Ariana Grande Ponders Singing ‘Wicked’ Music on Tour, Michael B. Jordan Was Left Out of ‘Sinners’ Group Chat, Cynthia Erivo Realizes She Broke a Record
summary: Golden Globe nominations are here, kicking off the first major event of Hollywood awards season. The nods were announced bright and early Monday morning, as actors, directors, writers and producers set alarms to hear their names mispronounced by Marlon Wayans. It’s tradition at Variety to call up s…
